tasks.title: Initialize Node.js project and configure package.json
tasks.description: Run `npm init -y` and configure package.json with name `book-api`, main `src/server.js`, scripts (`start`: `node src/server.js`, `test`: `jest --coverage --forceExit`), and engines `{ "node": ">=18.0.0" }`.

tasks.title: Install production dependencies (express, dotenv)
tasks.description: Run `npm install express dotenv` to add the HTTP framework and environment variable loader as production dependencies.

tasks.title: Install dev dependencies (jest, supertest)
tasks.description: Run `npm install --save-dev jest supertest` to add the test runner and HTTP assertion library as development dependencies.

tasks.title: Create .gitignore
tasks.description: Create `.gitignore` at project root with entries for `node_modules/`, `coverage/`, `.env`, and `*.db` to prevent committing generated files and secrets.

tasks.title: Create .env.example environment variable template
tasks.description: Create `.env.example` with `PORT=3000` and `NODE_ENV=development` as a reference template for required environment variables.

tasks.title: Implement health check route module (src/routes/health.js)
tasks.description: Create an Express Router in `src/routes/health.js` that defines `GET /health` returning status 200 with JSON body `{ "status": "ok" }`. Export the router.

tasks.title: Implement Express application factory (src/app.js)
tasks.description: Create `src/app.js` that imports Express, creates an app instance, mounts `express.json()` middleware, mounts the health route module at the root path, adds a catch-all 404 middleware returning `{ "error": "Not found" }`, and exports the app without calling `.listen()`.

tasks.title: Implement production server entry point (src/server.js)
tasks.description: Create `src/server.js` that loads `dotenv/config`, imports the app from `./app.js`, reads `PORT` from `process.env` (defaulting to 3000), calls `app.listen(PORT)`, and logs a startup message to stdout.

tasks.title: Create Jest configuration (jest.config.js)
tasks.description: Create `jest.config.js` with `testEnvironment: 'node'`, `roots: ['<rootDir>/test']`, `coverageDirectory: 'coverage'`, `coveragePathIgnorePatterns` excluding `node_modules` and `src/server.js`, and `coverageThreshold` set to 80% for statements, branches, functions, and lines.

tasks.title: Write integration tests for health endpoint and 404 handling (test/health.test.js)
tasks.description: Create `test/health.test.js` using supertest against the app. Implement three test cases: (1) `GET /health` returns 200 with `{ status: "ok" }`, (2) `GET /health` returns `application/json` content type, (3) `GET /nonexistent` returns 404 with `{ error: "Not found" }`.

tasks.title: Verify tests pass locally and coverage meets thresholds
tasks.description: Run `npm test` and confirm all 3 test cases pass. Verify the Jest coverage report is generated and all four metrics (statements, branches, functions, lines) meet the 80% threshold. Verify `src/server.js` is excluded from coverage.

tasks.title: Create GitHub Actions CI workflow (.github/workflows/ci.yml)
tasks.description: Create `.github/workflows/ci.yml` that triggers on push/PR to `main`, runs a matrix build against Node.js 18.x and 20.x, checks out the repo, sets up Node.js with npm cache, runs `npm ci`, runs `npm test`, and uploads the coverage directory as an artifact (even on failure).
